page.title: 01Faldingworth
page.content: The Faldingworth Block is predominantly a farming area situated in a broad valley 19km (12 miles) wide from East to West. To the West is the Lincoln Edge and to the East the Lincolnshire Wolds. The A46 is the only main road running through the Block. The village of{Faldingworth}is on the A46. It is 8km (5 miles) from Market Rasen and 21km (13 miles) from Lincoln. The features are a{church, school, {chapel, shop,}two{pubs, village hall } and a disused{windmill.} East of Faldingworth is the village of {Buslingthorpe,}to the North West is { {Virginia Estate,}and to the West is{ {Faldingworth Grange.} {
